name: American Ale
description: Well balanced. Ferments dry, finishes soft.

name: Belgian Ale
description: Abbey style, top-fermenting yeast for high gravity.

name: British Ale
description: Ferments dry and crisp, slightly tart and fruity.

name: Dry English Ale
description: Good for high gravity ales with no residuals.

name: English Ale
description: Very clear with some residual sweetness.

name: German Ale
description: Ferments dry and crisp with a mild flavor.

name: Northwest Ale
description: Malty, mildly fruity, good depth and complexity.

name: Scottish Ale
description: Suited for Scottish-style ales - high gravity ales.

name: Trappist Ale
description: Dry, estery flavor with a light, clove-like spiciness.

name: Wyeast Ale Blend
description: A blend of the best strains to provide quick starts.

name: Nodata Ale
